meaningMnemonic: Use your <radical>mouth</radical> to take a <radical>measurement</radical> of this <kanji>group</kanji>. Just stretch your mouth out and around every single person. Get 'em all in there.
readingMnemonic: This <kanji>group</kanji> is so big it takes you till <reading>dawn</reading> (だん) to get your measurement: they weigh a <reading>ton</reading> (とん) too!
